name: Stop them!
description:
Something terrible has happened and a bunch of your friends are being forced to commit suicide! I'ts up to you to stop them before it's too late!

# Credits
Joll05 - Design, Programming

Sag05 - Design, Art

# Tools
Game Engine: [Unity](https://unity3d.com)

Sprites: [Aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org)

Code Editor: [Visual Studio Community 2017](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com)

# Disclaimer
This game is not very well balanced, due to time restraints. It is really easy to "win" my just permanently building walls in front of the people. Please see this as a prototype rather than a finished game.
